alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:09AM MST until December 27 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and bitterly cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of around 1 inch. * WHERE...Musselshell, Golden Valley, Judith Gap and Southern Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Snow and blowing snow will reduce visibility and make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Arctic air and gusty winds will create bitterly cold wind chills of 20 to 35 below zero. These cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland
